Key Match Events: India's 15-game unbeaten home run came to an end at the hands of Qatar.
Moustafa Mashal, Almoez Ali, and Yousuf Abdurisag were on the scoresheet for Qatar.
Amrinder made a stunning save to deny a chance for Qatar.
Anirudh Thapa set up Apuia, whose shot blazed over the crossbar.
Thapa had the best chance for India to level things up, set up by Sunil Chhetri.
Almoez Ali scored in the 47th minute after Amrinder couldn't hold onto the ball.
Abdurisag scored in the 86th minute to seal the win for Qatar.
